Text:
Thank you very much !!!
I agree with you whole heartedly, it is a great
Western. Your huge efforts in posting all of these seasons in their entirety is greatly appreciated.
Please keep seeding them, they are big files and will take quite some time to complete.
THANKS AGAIN !!!

I sincerely request everybody to PLEASE KEEP SEEDING these great Classics of a bygone era, and to keep them alive for a long, long time.
Thank You All.
